messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: more interested in proving a   point than in having a discussion
messages.msgSnippet: ... Born weird......still am.  I work at it.   Tia Tia Leschke   leschke@islandnet.com On Vancouver Island
messages.messageBody:
At 11:08 PM 11/16/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Tia,
>At least you get wisdom with age!
>I shouldn't say that, maybe you were born this way?

Born weird......still am. I work at it. <g>
Tia

Tia Leschke leschke@...
On Vancouver Island

It is the answers which separate us, the questions which unite us. - Janice
Levy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: more interested in proving a  point than in having a discussion
messages.msgSnippet: Tia, At least you get wisdom with age! I shouldn t say that, maybe you were born this way? Leslie So do I.  And if I *sometimes* find your way of putting
messages.messageBody:
Tia,
At least you get wisdom with age!
I shouldn't say that, maybe you were born this way?
Leslie





So do I. And if I *sometimes* find your way of putting things abrasive, I
can choose not to read them. So far it hasn't bothered me enough to stop.

I also enjoy reading Lynda's posts. Lots to chew on there.

I also enjoy reading most of Bridget's posts. She often gives me something
new to think about.

What I'm really tired of reading is the bickering. I remember my mother's
fave thing to say when me sister and I were bickering. "I'm going to knock
your heads together." Sometimes I'd like to do a cyber head-knocking
around here. <g>
Tia

Tia Leschke leschke@...
On Vancouver Island

It is the answers which separate us, the questions which unite us. - Janice
